de.griefed.monitoring.components

Class HostComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.monitoring.components.HostComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InformationModel

    @Service
public class HostComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements InformationModel
    Class responsible for retrieving all interesting information about the host.

      • getValues

        public java.lang.String getValues()
        Getter for the information about the host. Gathers information about the host name, domain name, and for all the network interfaces respectively, it gathers the name, ipv4 address, subnet mask in CIDR notation and the mac address.
        Specified by:
        getValues in interface InformationModel
        Returns:
        String. Information about the host in JSON format.
